DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the compliance of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) in young people with Chronic rheumatic disease
DOC.brief_title: Compliance of Traditional Chinese Medicine in Young Patients With Rheumatic Diseases
DOC.criteria: were between 18 and 35 years of age without use of TCM in the previous 3 months and had a Steinbrocker functional status of class I, II, or III previous general health conditions disallowed their use of TCM were pregnant lack of motivation, remote from home, timeconsuming,intervention, or other personal difficulties
